definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: SpendingPulse tracks all forms of spending, including cash.
sentences.chinese: 消費脈動追蹤所有消費的形式，包括現金。

sentences.english: This energy is something like positive and negative electrical charges pulsating throughout.
sentences.chinese: 這種能量就像正負電荷一樣脈動着流遍全身。

sentences.english: The showerhead massage is the control that switches the water from a steady stream to a pulsating jet spray.
sentences.chinese: 淋浴噴頭按摩是通過控制水流的脈動和噴灑來完成的。

sentences.english: The theory explains the microseisms are originating from surf or other action at steep coasts.
sentences.chinese: 該理論解釋脈動的原因是激浪或陡岸的其它作用。

sentences.english: He feels such energy pulsing within him, driving him to action.
sentences.chinese: 他會感覺到這種能量在身體裏脈動，給他行動的力量。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, pulsatile motion can help heal injuries in situ too.
sentences.chinese: 令人驚訝的是，脈動式的動作也有助於傷口癒合。

sentences.english: Double-speed with pulse function, mixing excellent results .
sentences.chinese: 雙速具脈動功能，攪拌效果極佳。

sentences.english: Periodic pressure undulation may be incited by fast valving control.
sentences.chinese: 使用快關調節閥控制能激勵週期蒸汽壓力脈動。

sentences.english: Sterilizing was performed within a pulsating side-spraying sterilization kettle.
sentences.chinese: 採用脈動側噴式殺菌釜進行殺菌。

sentences.english: The time-average and pulsant pressure characteristic have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了臺階式溢洪道的時均壓強和脈動壓強特性。

sentences.english: Application of maths simulating method in research of membrane structure windy reation;
sentences.chinese: 研究了索膜結構在脈動風作用下的動力特性。

sentences.english: The team calls their work the "pulse of the nation".
sentences.chinese: 研究團隊把他們的這項工作稱爲“國家脈動”。

sentences.english: The turbulence power distribution inner of stadium offers reference for the analysis on the simultaneous wind.
sentences.chinese: 體育場內部湍動能的分佈爲脈動風的分析提供了依據。

sentences.english: The differentiability of the solution of impulsive flow in a hydraulic pipe due to impact are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先討論脈動流的撞擊液壓問題解的可微性。

sentences.english: And, to be clear, the pulse bears a lot of good things, too.
sentences.chinese: 並且，更清楚的是這脈動也承載了許多好事兒。

sentences.english: So many of us are addicted to the pulse.
sentences.chinese: 我們很多人都有脈動癮。

definition: to comply/to conform to/in tune with/adapting to/to adjust to
socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
